name: Poste Restante
description:
Ronnie is a post lady in training who goes on an adventure to deliver a letter to her childhood friend. Her way lays through valley filled with monsters and all sorts of dangerous stuff. To help in her travels Ronnie gets a trusty sword and some delivery boxes. Along the way she will meet new people and collect other letters to deliver.

This game is a story about coming out and reconecting with old friends.

(this is a prototype, project is currently in development)

music used: louie zong - in the willows
